title: My LoL Client won't launch.
body:
When attempting to click the LoL launcher the League Icon pops for for 0.5 seconds then disappears. I've tried to run as admin, as well as run the repair tool. Nothing so far has helped. 

{{champion:202}}

replies.body: Hmmmm this sounds a lot like the usual permissions issue where League doesn't have the right admin priveledges to run (which should be fixed up easily following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) so be sure to check that first). If that's not helping something else could be going a little screwy. If permissions aren't the issue, go ahead and try running a quick repair as well.
